Oyun gerçekten çok keyifli, özellikle arkadaşlarınız ile birlikte vakit geçirebilecek ve bu süre zarfında eğlenebilecek bir oyun arıyorsanız bu kesinlikle Dead by Daylight olur.
Aslında diğer oyunlarda olduğu gibi zamanla birçok şeyi kavrayacaksınız ve bu sayede daha da keyif alacaksınız. Oyunun kendi havasının verdiği gerilim, korku ve heyecan üst düzeyde.

Kısacası alın pişman olmazsınız.  Bu arada lütfen face-camp ve tunnel yapmayın ki keyif alabilelim. (Özellikle Rusça yazmak istiyorum.) пожалуйста, не разбивайте лагерь и не туннелируйте çoğu kişi ne demek istediğimi anlamıştır :').

Good game but has 2 major problems 

one is this game is heavy on farming and you could play for hundreds of hours and still be nowhere close to getting most perks,

2nd the matchmaking is broken beyond hope and you will almost never get a fair match with a killer or a survivor.

This game is good and but not without issues. The matchmaking does not work well and can discourage new players. There are three different point systems which can be confusing. There is no real real tutorial for what some things mean in the game so it would benefit a new player to watch someone who streams this game steadily. Overall, it's really fun with friends to play as the survivor, and the killer while playing solo. The devs need to improve this game a bit if they want it to stay alive or build enough trust for a future DBD2 release.

Eine Bewertung abgeben? Sehr schwierig, aber fangen wir mit dem ersten Punkt an.

Ich habe das Spiel ja nun so ein paar Tage schon ;)
Es ist alles wie am ersten Tag. Nur mit dem unterschied das es mehr verfügbare Killer als auch mehr "Überlebende" gibt. Karten sind auch einige dazu gekommen.
(Negativ) 

(-) Nur das, was seit dem ersten Tag an geblieben ist sind Killer, die einen Überlebenden fest gehakt haben entweder direkt daneben oder in greifbarer Nähe zu ihm bleiben. Das macht es fürchterlich schwierig ihn zu befreien ... selbst auch  wenn man sich dem Killer nährt bleibt er neben seinen Opfer stehen.

(-) Es gibt aber im eigenen Team solche die mit Absicht aus dem Spiel gehen, entweder weil der Killer für sie zu stark oder die Karte nicht deren Wünschen entspricht.

Das frustet "etwas" und damit sollte man klar kommen und es sollte jeden klar sein das sowas ab und an vorkommt.

Aber wenn man den dreh raus hat als Überlebender dann geht es eigentlich. Mit einer Prise "Scheißegal ob ich gewinne oder nicht" darf dabei nicht fehlen ;D

(Positiv)

(+) Neue Spielbare Charaktere als auch Karten.

Am sonsten als Killer zu spielen ist ziemlich einfach. Man merkt deutlich das sie sich auch unterscheiden in ihrer Spielweise.

Das lässt ab und zu mal ein Killer-Spieler dumm da stehen :D ;)

... zum Abschluss ...

Ich spiele sehr gern Dr. Sommer nur, es gibt einfach zuviele Killer und spiele daher nun überwiegend Überlebender ... auch wenn es manchmal einen zerreist ... :)

this is my second review on the game and I did not recommend this game during my first review. I'm more on the fence about it now because matchmaking has gotten a lot better with only a few matches do high ranks get paired with low ranks. 

Overall, I do recommend this game, but for those who are thinking of buying it, do know that it is a VERY steep learning curve. I recommend going online and watching a few videos to get the basics of how the game works. Now, the community can get incredibly toxic, as what happens when you pit people against other people, especially if they only play one side and good luck trying to get helps from the devs. But overall, this game is incredibly addicting, especially if you have a friend to play it with. Good luck and have fun
很棒

UPDATE: New Buggy MMR has been put back on hold for reworking. Hopefully it won't be re-released until it's working much better.

I originally got this game for free a couple years ago on PSN. I switched over to PC because my console has connectivity issues at times. So my hours in game on steam are less than total hours played.

That said, why do I not recommend this game? Because the new MMR is so shit that it makes every round I have feel like the worst ones from the old matchmaking. I would take a couple month break from the game if I hadn't just bought the rift season pass (similar to the Fortnite Battle Pass, etc).

I don't play a lot of multiplayer games and this has always been a huge favorite of mine, but right now there's no joy in it at all. In the post game chat I spend most of my time apologizing to newer players and telling them to try coming back later when the matchmaking "fixes" are fixed. I don't know how many of them refunded the game, but based on the reviews I'm seeing, quite a few already have.

It actually makes me sad because I got into this game because the community is pretty kind most of the time. There's always the toxic tryhards and the people who trash talk because they lost, but overall there's some really great people in this game as evidenced by how a lot of high rank killers are taking pity on survivors and letting them win because the matchmaking should never have paired them up to begin with. Nobody who has owned the game for 3 hours should be pitted against someone who's played it for over 1000 hours. Nobody. But that's what the latest MMR bullshit is doing to our once great game.
